name: LUMINOUS KNIFE
description:
On 18 March 2020, Ben Roswell ran a second #deckjam on Twitter. Participants wrote cards based on on Sasha Reneau's "Spindlewheel," with each card using the one before it as inspiration. All in all,  more than sixty contributors wrote around 410 cards, give or take a few. It fuckin whipped. 

This Twine game collects those tweets into a browseable format. Follow the paths. Get lost. Bright objects hypnotize the mind. Enjoy everything.
